content: पातन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पत्-णिच् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Felling. cutting down. --नं {@--1@} Causing to fall down, bringing or throwing down, knocking down. {@--2@} Throwing, casting. {@--3@} Humbling, lowering. {@--4@} Removing. {%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} पातनं may have different meanings according to the noun with which it is used; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} दडस्य पातनं ‘causing the rod to fall’, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} chastising; गर्भस्य पातनं ‘causing the fœtus to fall’, causing an abortion.
